details.name: description
details.old_value:
In a similar fashion of the Objective indicator (#536), add the dynamite indicator.
Planted/defused dynamite are announced, so this would simply increase awareness of the situation for players.

A few notes:
* I'm not keen on adding the actual dynamite countre, as this could be a crucial information
* use the same position as other indicator, with priority being last (shield first, then adren/disguise, then obj, then dynamite)

details.new_value:
In a similar fashion of the Objective indicator (#536), add the dynamite indicator.
Planted/defused dynamite are announced, so this would simply increase awareness of the situation for players.

A few notes:
* I'm not keen on adding the actual dynamite counter value, as this could be a crucial information. It could be added for shoutcasters though.
* use the same position as other indicator, with priority being last (shield first, then adren/disguise, then obj, then dynamite)?
* add dyna name location, as this could be very useful too.
* consider implementing dyna chaining, where multiple dyna on a single objective would all explode as soon as the first dyna does (see NQ).

details.name: description
details.old_value:
In a similar fashion of the Objective indicator (#536), add the dynamite indicator.
Planted/defused dynamite are announced, so this would simply increase awareness of the situation for players.

A few notes:
* I'm not keen on adding the actual dynamite counter value, as this could be a crucial information. It could be added for shoutcasters though.
* use the same position as other indicator, with priority being last (shield first, then adren/disguise, then obj, then dynamite)?
* add dyna name location, as this could be very useful too.
* consider implementing dyna chaining, where multiple dyna on a single objective would all explode as soon as the first dyna does (see NQ).
details.new_value:
In a similar fashion of the Objective indicator (#536), add the dynamite indicator.
Planted/defused dynamite are announced, so this would simply increase awareness of the situation for players.

A few notes:
* I'm not keen on adding the actual dynamite counter value, as this could be a crucial information. It could be added for shoutcasters though.
* use the same position as other indicator, with priority being last (shield first, then adren/disguise, then obj, then dynamite)?
* add dyna name location, as this could be very useful too.
* consider implementing dyna chaining, where multiple dyna on a single objective would all explode as soon as the first dyna does (see NQ). Think about multiple stage objective (like a bridge that should be dynamited twice), as this could be a fix for the "workaround" of engineer putting two dynamite at once to destroy the objective very quickly.

subject: Add dynamite counter indicator
description:
In a similar fashion of the Objective indicator (#536), add the dynamite indicator.
Planted/defused dynamite are announced, so this would simply increase awareness of the situation for players.

A few notes:
* I'm not keen on adding the actual dynamite counter value, as this could be a crucial information. It could be added for shoutcasters though.
* use the same position as other indicator, with priority being last (shield first, then adren/disguise, then obj, then dynamite)?
* add dyna name location, as this could be very useful too.
* consider implementing dyna chaining, where multiple dyna on a single objective would all explode as soon as the first dyna does (see NQ). Think about multiple stage objective (like a bridge that should be dynamited twice), as this could be a fix for the "workaround" of engineer putting two dynamite at once to destroy the objective very quickly.
